text: Sukunabikona is the Shinto kami of hot springs, agriculture, healing, magic, brewing sake and knowledge. His name means "the small lord of renown." He is often described as being a dwarf and is often paired with ÅŒkuninushi. The asteroid 10725 Sukunabikona derives its name from him. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Amatsukami Category:Tutelary deities Category:Japanese mythology Category:Pages with unreviewed translations Category:Articles having same image on Wikidata and Wikipedia
title: Sukunabikona
